title: Unnecessary censorship
body:
So today I was playing with somebody and his name was Boboking or something like that so I shortened it to Bobo and for some reason every single person in the chat saw that it was censored and it was censored to me as well when I turned the chat filter back on.

Now I'm not entirely sure if this is a hate slur somewhere in another language or something of that nature but I know that it's been a big thing lately with them unnecessarily censoring certain things

replies.body:
Only thing I could find is that its Spanish for "fool".

Outside of that, mostly positive in reference to the new french socio-economic class.

> [{quoted}](name=WoonStruck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ojUEY6MI,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-24T04:03:41.553+0000)
>
> Only thing I could find is that its Spanish for "fool".
> 
> Outside of that, mostly positive in reference to the new french socio-economic class.

Weird cuz usually it means like a minor injury and a kid be like "bobo!"
Mostly French too like you said but I don't think it's positive to say the least.
